title: I love backing once in bot lane and coming back with no tower
body:
It still blows my fucking mind when I back after shoving a wave in with my support but when we return, 1 push was all it took to lose the first tower.

At least Baron minions are getting buffed for the LC$.

:  ^)

(inb4 downvotes and people defending riot)

Edit: Jesus, this post exploded...

replies.body:
You think that's bad?  Top and mid towers are supposed to be stronger than bot tower right now, but they die just as fast.

> (inb4 downvotes and people defending riot)

I was going to upvote, but comments like this don't deserve upvotes.  You didn't even wait for downvotes to happen before you grouped up all dissenting opinions into a single category.  Seriously now, try to have a little class.

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-19T00:21:17.473+0000)
>
> You think that's bad?  Top and mid towers are supposed to be stronger than bot tower right now, but they die just as fast.
> 
> I was going to upvote, but comments like this don't deserve upvotes.  You didn't even wait for downvotes to happen before you grouped up all dissenting opinions into a single category.  Seriously now, try to have a little class.

I mean, people on the boards do that all the time.
And here i am, agreeing with both of you.

Agree to disagree to agree?

I love logic puzzles.

I agree to RedniwediS that:

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-19T00:21:17.473+0000)
>

> I was going to upvote, but comments like this don't deserve upvotes.  You didn't even wait for downvotes to happen before you grouped up all dissenting opinions into a single category.  Seriously now, try to have a little class.

I also agree to xXRaichopXx that: 

> [{quoted}](name=xXRaichopXx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-19T01:56:15.042+0000)
>
> I mean, people on the boards do that all the time.

I am in a Moral Conflict, since i agree to both.
So? Be better than that.

> [{quoted}](name=Spank the Fox,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2018-02-19T04:50:19.850+0000)
>
> So? Be better than that.

No, I mean people always downvote and support riot, no matter what they do...
You gotta be really delusional to think that somebody is fully supporting Riot if they're downvoting you. Maybe there's a possibility that you're wrong on the discussed subject?

> [{quoted}](name=Daunt,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=00000000000100000000,timestamp=2018-02-19T13:46:31.081+0000)
>
> You gotta be really delusional to think that somebody is fully supporting Riot if they're downvoting you. Maybe there's a possibility that you're wrong on the discussed subject?

I never claimed that all downvoters are Riot supporters, i'm just saying the boards has a lot of them?
Do you know what i see more of? Whiners. Whiners that complain about stuff they don't understand instead of trying to improve at the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Daunt,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-19T23:09:25.315+0000)
>
> Do you know what i see more of? Whiners. Whiners that complain about stuff they don't understand instead of trying to improve at the game.

Wow, you got really upset over a forum post since you feel the need to rage at every comment I make

He isn't raging at all, he is having a discussion. I know it is tough to actually discuss something with someone when they disagree with you but I think you are capable of doing it if you try a little harder.

>Do you know what i see more of? Whiners. Whiners that complain about stuff they don't understand instead of trying to improve at the game.

That's supposed to be, "having a discussion"? lol. His reply to OP had literally nothing to do with what it was replying to and implying he's a whiner not trying to improve is an attempt at shutting down any possibility of constructive discussion if anything.

Boards right now are filled with people complaining left and right, there's one occasional positive post in terms of "Swain's splash art is cool" and you still think "People always support Riot". This is not something you should say in times where people on the Boards might have never been more angry about so many different things like right now.

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=00000000000100000001,timestamp=2018-02-19T16:48:11.727+0000)
>
> Boards right now are filled with people complaining left and right, there's one occasional positive post in terms of "Swain's splash art is cool" and you still think "People always support Riot". This is not something you should say in times where people on the Boards might have never been more angry about so many different things like right now.

Yeah, gameplay especially is insane right now.

But you're literally contributing to the insanity with shit posts like this. It's more than obvious that you made a mistake. Rather than making a post about how the game is unfair you should try to improve.
Do you think they have a valid reason to do so?

> I was going to upvote, but comments like this don't deserve upvotes.  You didn't even wait for downvotes to happen before you grouped up all dissenting opinions into a single category.  Seriously now, try to have a little class.

Hypocritical tbh
What part do you feel is hypocritical?

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2018-02-20T08:30:46.899+0000)
>
> What part do you feel is hypocritical?

You're calling him out for adding a tacked-on statement unrelated to the discussion content to spark controversy/farm upvotes. This is exactly what you're doing with that comment, by unnecessarily drawing attention to the topic of "upvote farming" rather than the main (and important) discussion of the topic at hand: snowballing, and weak turrets. It's also an ad hominem.

Which is basically what I'm doing here as well.
Honestly, if you shoved a wave in and back, it's almost impossible for the wave to hit your tower, let alone lose it. I'm smelling serious bs here.

I can't speak for botlane, but midlane, it feels like it doesn't matter what I do to the wave, I lose like 3-5 minions to my tower before I can return to lane. Pushing power is no longer a specific strength for champions, but the default.
Recall on cannon minion because the tower takes like 6 shots for it to kill the cannon creep. At most you generally miss the wheelchair and maybe one melee.
I mean I know, but most meta midlaner can just delete the wave when they get to lane, and there's not another wave for 30s.

It doesn't take that long to get back to lane though. You literally shove the hell out of the wave, recall, buy your items the second you get to the base, and start walking. It takes like 45 seconds tops to recall and be back in lane which on a cannon wave generally will only lose one cannon or so worth of gold.

Depends on the lane match-up or if the support freezes the wave. 

Jungler help also can cause it.


Some factors can explain it - but the existence of such an event is not null

I agree with this.  I have seen a few games now where, all 5 lanes hit bottom early and take first tower in seconds.  And with some of the early burst, half the time it isn't just peopel backing, but getting tower dived and not having to pay anything for it except maybe some cheap shield.  Turrets need to be a little meatier early or ditch the first tower gold.

Turrets don't need to get meatier they just need to do more damage. Right now with the way shit is, you can dive on a tower at level 5 with just tabbis and tank 5-7 shots depending on who you're playing. How the fuck are you supposed to defend a 4 man dive when Sion or any other shielded tank can take 8 turret shots 6 minutes into the game with 3 people murdering you In the time it takes for 3-4 turret shots to fire.
Can you give more info on the game? What was the matchup? did their jungler come? How ahead/behind were the enemies? How long were you gone when you backed? What was the game time?

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-19T00:31:20.614+0000)
>
> Can you give more info on the game? What was the matchup? did their jungler come? How ahead/behind were the enemies? How long were you gone when you backed? What was the game time?

About 7 minutes in I backed just to buy a couple of items.
That's like... 1/5 things I asked for. Can you elaborate more please?

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-02-19T02:07:23.084+0000)
>
> That's like... 1/5 things I asked for. Can you elaborate more please?

DRAVEN AND BARD VS EZREAL AND BRAUM, YES HE DID A FEW TIMES, THE ENEMIES WERE 2 KILLS BEHIND, I WASNT GONE FOR VERY LONG
THANK YOU THAT HELPS ELABORATE ON THINGS.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-19T02:21:25.209+0000)
>
> THANK YOU THAT HELPS ELABORATE ON THINGS.

np :)

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-19T00:31:20.614+0000)
>
> Can you give more info on the game? What was the matchup? did their jungler come? How ahead/behind were the enemies? How long were you gone when you backed? What was the game time?

You must be lost, Reddit is thataway <------ this is the lol boards standard posts include vague situations with no details, narratives that give all the agency to enemy roles but somehow completely forget about their teammates, and down voting of opinions not based on their merit but whether or not they agree with you, none of that info and statistics you are on about

Seeing how under normal circumstances, it's almost impossible, he probably shoved the wave in only after the next wave was already almost in lane, and he sat in base to buy an item, which means that the enemy team got some free 20 seconds with the tower, maybe even with the help of the jungler. No surprise, honestly, and it's still hard to believe that this could happen anyway.
Wait so if this is true then why didn't you just take their tower instead then back?

> [{quoted}](name=Iffy Jarl,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-02-19T05:05:52.803+0000)
>
> Wait so if this is true then why didn't you just take their tower instead then back?

No mana to push the wave...

> [{quoted}](name=xXRaichopXx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-02-19T05:48:59.335+0000)
>
> No mana to push the wave...
got a clip?

> [{quoted}](name=Iffy Jarl,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2018-02-19T05:56:40.263+0000)
>
> got a clip?

Why the hell would you need a clip? Are people on the boards really that paranoid?
Yes because most of them like to defend broken champs and mechanics so you better record all of your games so biased kids can see the prove on their own eyes. Yeah it's paranoid and dumb. Pretty sad.

How is that paranoid? Most people on boards talk bullshit until you look them up on OP.GG. Just look at any post from Yenn. In your post you said you shoved the wave yet now you're saying you didn't have enough mana to do it. I smell bullshit here as well. If you left the lane with minions coming into you, you totally deserved to get punished for it.
It's time for more open minds toward supports taking teleport just to get their asses back into lane faster.

LMAO yeah right everyone here does literally nothin but attack riot

That said I 100% agree it's unreal how fuckin useless turrets are right now

Its because Riot has no understanding of the game for 99% of the players.  All they care about is LC$ shit.

Its like Pro Ball they dont care about anything other then $$.

> [{quoted}](name=MysteriousBootie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-02-19T09:29:28.431+0000)

> That said I 100% agree it's unreal how fuckin useless turrets are right now

I agree but also disagree, I feel like it's a war between Riot supporters and haters. I just wish they would start fixing stuff to make everyone happy...

(Yeah I know, 1 person will always complain, but this is obviously a problem for EVERYONE)
an AFK {{champion:51}} with {{item:1038}} {{item:1042}} and auto attack on make a better turret than the ones we have now.

> [{quoted}](name=Exvayate,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bnrnlLr4,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2018-02-19T18:07:56.461+0000)
>
> an AFK {{champion:51}} with {{item:1038}} {{item:1042}} and auto attack on make a better turret than the ones we have now.

Lmao
i was thinking the same. 1 jungle gank is all it needs for first bot tower. If not then double kill at bot lane. I wouldn't mind if this requirement was changed to 2 jgl ganks at minimum.
In this situation, you would honestly have to sit in fountain waiting for 100 gold or something. Or push three caster minions only. Like, what?
